<!-- ===== Utils: cookies/params/persistência (sem globals) ===== -->
<script>
(function() {
  "use strict";

  // --- Cookie helpers ---
  var getCleanDomain = function() { return location.hostname.replace(/^www\./i, ""); };
  var setCookie = function(name, value, days) {
    if (!name) return;
    var expires = new Date(Date.now() + (days||30)*24*60*60*1000).toUTCString();
    var cleanDomain = getCleanDomain();
    document.cookie = name + "=" + encodeURIComponent(value) + "; SameSite=None; Secure; expires=" + expires + "; path=/; domain=." + cleanDomain;
  };
  var getCookieMap = function() {
    return document.cookie.split("; ").reduce(function(acc, cookie) {
      if (!cookie) return acc;
      var idx = cookie.indexOf("=");
      var key = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(0, idx) : cookie;
      var val = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(idx+1) : "";
      acc[key] = val ? decodeURIComponent(val) : "";
      return acc;
    }, {});
  };

  // --- Storage helpers (resilientes) ---
  var toStringSafe = function(v) {
    if (v == null) return "";
    if (typeof v === "string") return v;
    try { return JSON.stringify(v); } catch(e) { return String(v); }
  };
  var setData = function(name, value) {
    if (!name) return;
    var s = toStringSafe(value);
    if (!s || s.trim() === "") return;
    try { window.sessionStorage.setItem(name, s); } catch(e) {}
    setCookie(name, s, 30);
  };
  var getData = function(name) {
    var v = null;
    try { v = window.sessionStorage.getItem(name); } catch(e) {}
    if (v) return v;
    var cookies = getCookieMap();
    return cookies[name] || null;
  };

  // --- Params helpers ---
  var parseQuery = function(qs) { return Object.fromEntries(new URLSearchParams(qs).entries()); };
  var lower = function(s) { return (s || "").toString().trim().toLowerCase(); };

  // Captura params atuais
  var params = parseQuery(window.location.search);

  // Salva IDs de clique e UTMs relevantes (persistência 30d)
  var clickIds = {
    ifp_ttclid: params.ttclid,
    ifp_fbclid: params.fbclid,
    ifp_gclid: params.gclid,
    ifp_clickid: (lower(params.utm_source) === "kwai" && params.click_id) ? params.click_id : null
  };
  Object.keys(clickIds).forEach(function(k){ if (clickIds[k]) setData(k, clickIds[k]); });
  if (Object.keys(params).length) setData("ifp_search_params", params); // guarda JSON

  // Metadados de página iniciais (opcionalmente úteis a outras integrações)
  setData("lp_origin_path", window.location.pathname);
  setData("ifp_original_url", window.location.pathname);
  setData("ifp_original_title", document.title);
  setData("ifp_original_cookies", document.cookie);

  // Referrer normalizado priorizando UTMs/clickids
  var utmSource = lower(params.utm_source);
  var utmCampaign = lower(params.utm_campaign || params.utm_name);
  var referrerMap = {
    "google": (utmCampaign.includes("youtube") || utmCampaign.includes("demand-gen")) ? "https://www.youtube.com" : "https://www.google.com",
    "fb": "https://m.facebook.com",
    "ig": "https://www.instagram.com",
    "tiktok": "https://www.tiktok.com",
    "kwai": "https://www.kwai.com"
  };
  var referrer = document.referrer || "$direct";
  var hasAdSignals = !!(utmSource || params.gclid || params.fbclid || params.ttclid || params.click_id || params.gbraid || params.wbraid);
  if (hasAdSignals) {
    if (utmSource === "ig" || (params.fbclid && utmSource !== "fb")) {
      referrer = referrerMap["ig"];
    } else if (utmSource === "google" && utmCampaign.includes("youtube")) {
      referrer = referrerMap["google"];
    } else {
      referrer = referrerMap[utmSource] || (utmSource ? ("https://www." + utmSource + ".com") : referrer);
    }
  } else if (referrer !== "$direct") {
    try {
      var refHost = new URL(referrer).hostname;
      if (referrer.startsWith("android-app://") || referrer.includes("safeframe.googlesyndication.com") || refHost.includes("infinitepay.io")) {
        referrer = "$direct";
      }
    } catch(e) { referrer = "$direct"; }
  } else {
    referrer = "$direct";
  }
  setData("ifp_original_referrer", referrer);

  // Expõe apenas um getter leve (opcional); se não quiser nada global, remova:
  window.getIFPPersistedParams = function() {
    var raw = getData("ifp_search_params");
    if (!raw) return {};
    try { return (typeof raw === "string") ? JSON.parse(raw) : raw; } catch(e) { return {}; }
  };

})();
</script>

<!-- ===== Rudder page() robusto + SPA hooks (sem logs) ===== -->
<script>
(function(){
  "use strict";

  // Helpers locais (duplicados para independência de outros blocos)
  var getCookieMap = function() {
    return document.cookie.split("; ").reduce(function(acc, cookie) {
      if (!cookie) return acc;
      var idx = cookie.indexOf("=");
      var key = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(0, idx) : cookie;
      var val = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(idx+1) : "";
      acc[key] = val ? decodeURIComponent(val) : "";
      return acc;
    }, {});
  };
  var parseQuery = function(qs) { return Object.fromEntries(new URLSearchParams(qs).entries()); };
  var lower = function(s) { return (s || "").toString().trim().toLowerCase(); };
  var getPersistedParams = function() {
    var raw = null;
    try { raw = window.sessionStorage.getItem("ifp_search_params"); } catch(e) {}
    if (!raw) {
      var cookies = getCookieMap();
      raw = cookies["ifp_search_params"] || null;
    }
    if (!raw) return {};
    try { return (typeof raw === "string") ? JSON.parse(raw) : raw; } catch(e) { return {}; }
  };

  function buildPagePayload() {
  var cookies = getCookieMap();
  var now = parseQuery(window.location.search);
  var persisted = getPersistedParams();
  var pick = function(k){ return (now[k] != null ? now[k] : persisted[k]) || null; };

  return {
    path: window.location.pathname,
    title: document.title,
    referrer: (cookies["ifp_original_referrer"] && cookies["ifp_original_referrer"].trim() !== "") ? cookies["ifp_original_referrer"] : (document.referrer || "$direct"),
    search: window.location.search,
    url: window.location.href,
    utm_source: pick("utm_source"),
    utm_medium: pick("utm_medium"),
    utm_campaign: pick("utm_campaign") || pick("utm_name"),
    utm_content: pick("utm_content"),
    utm_term: pick("utm_term"),
    ttclid: pick("ttclid"),
    fbclid: pick("fbclid"),
    gclid: pick("gclid"),
    all_cookies: cookies
  };
}

  function sendPage() {
    try {
      var data = buildPagePayload();
      if (window.rudderanalytics && window.rudderanalytics.page) {
        window.rudderanalytics.page(data);
      }
    } catch(e) {}
  }

  // Disparo inicial quando o DOM está pronto
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(){
    if (window.rudderanalytics && window.rudderanalytics.ready) {
      window.rudderanalytics.ready(function(){ sendPage(); });
    } else {
      sendPage();
    }
  });

  // Hooks de SPA
  (function hookHistory(){
    var push = history.pushState, replace = history.replaceState;
    history.pushState = function() {
      var r = push.apply(this, arguments);
      setTimeout(sendPage, 0);
      return r;
    };
    history.replaceState = function() {
      var r = replace.apply(this, arguments);
      setTimeout(sendPage, 0);
      return r;
    };
    window.addEventListener("popstate", function(){ setTimeout(sendPage, 0); });
  })();

})();
</script>

<!-- ===== AppsFlyer OneLink (logs apenas do carregamento do SmartScript) ===== -->
<script>
(function(){
  "use strict";

  function waitForSmartScript(callback, attempts, delay) {
    attempts = (typeof attempts === "number") ? attempts : 10;
    delay = (typeof delay === "number") ? delay : 300;
    if (window.AF_SMART_SCRIPT && typeof window.AF_SMART_SCRIPT.generateOneLinkURL === "function") {
      console.log("AppsFlyer SmartScript pronto"); // único log permitido
      callback();
    } else if (attempts > 0) {
      setTimeout(function(){ waitForSmartScript(callback, attempts - 1, delay); }, delay);
    } else {
      console.error("AF_SMART_SCRIPT não disponível."); // erro crítico
    }
  }

  // Helpers locais para pegar params/cookies sem depender de __ifp
  var parseQuery = function(qs){ return Object.fromEntries(new URLSearchParams(qs).entries()); };
  var getCookieMap = function(){
    return document.cookie.split("; ").reduce(function(acc, cookie) {
      if (!cookie) return acc;
      var idx = cookie.indexOf("=");
      var key = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(0, idx) : cookie;
      var val = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(idx+1) : "";
      acc[key] = val ? decodeURIComponent(val) : "";
      return acc;
    }, {});
  };
  var getPersistedParams = function(){
    var raw = null;
    try { raw = window.sessionStorage.getItem("ifp_search_params"); } catch(e) {}
    if (!raw) {
      var cookies = getCookieMap();
      raw = cookies["ifp_search_params"] || null;
    }
    if (!raw) return {};
    try { return (typeof raw === "string") ? JSON.parse(raw) : raw; } catch(e) { return {}; }
  };

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    waitForSmartScript(function () {
      var now = parseQuery(window.location.search);
      var persisted = getPersistedParams();
      var pick = function(k){ return (now[k] != null ? now[k] : persisted[k]) || null; };

      var oneLinkConfigs = {
        'general': {
          id: 'general',
          oneLinkURL: "https://infinitepay.onelink.me/lpUT",
          webReferrer: "af_channel",
          afParameters: {
            mediaSource: { keys: ["utm_source"], defaultValue: "organic_source" },
            campaign: { keys: ["utm_name","utm_campaign"], defaultValue: "lp_traffic" },
            ad: { keys: ["utm_term"], defaultValue: "lp_download_qrcode" },
            googleClickIdKey: "af_sub1",
            afSub2: { keys: ["fbclid"] },
            adSet: { keys: ["utm_content"], defaultValue: "lp_download" },
            afSub4: {
              keys: [],
              defaultValue: (window.rudderanalytics && typeof rudderanalytics.getAnonymousId === "function")
                  ? rudderanalytics.getAnonymousId()
                  : "unknown_id"
            },
            afCustom: [{ paramKey: "af_ss_ui", defaultValue: "true" }]
          }
        },
        'blog-general': {
          id: 'blog-general',
          oneLinkURL: "https://infinitepay.onelink.me/lpUT",
          webReferrer: "af_channel",
          afParameters: {
            mediaSource: { keys: ["utm_source"], defaultValue: "organic_source" },
            campaign: { keys: ["utm_name","utm_campaign"], defaultValue: "blog_header" },
            ad: { keys: ["utm_term"], defaultValue: "lp_download_qrcode" },
            googleClickIdKey: "af_sub1",
            afSub2: { keys: ["fbclid"] },
            adSet: { keys: ["utm_content"], defaultValue: "lp_download" },
            afSub4: {
              keys: [],
              defaultValue: (window.rudderanalytics && typeof rudderanalytics.getAnonymousId === "function")
                  ? rudderanalytics.getAnonymousId()
                  : "unknown_id"
            },
            afCustom: [{ paramKey: "af_ss_ui", defaultValue: "true" }]
          }
        }
      };

      Object.keys(oneLinkConfigs).forEach(function (contextKey) {
        var config = oneLinkConfigs[contextKey];
        var result = window.AF_SMART_SCRIPT.generateOneLinkURL({
          oneLinkURL: config.oneLinkURL,
          webReferrer: config.webReferrer,
          afParameters: config.afParameters
        });
        if (result && result.clickURL) {
          var result_url = result.clickURL;
          // Atualiza anchors com data-onelink="contextKey"
          var linkElements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-onelink="' + contextKey + '"]');
          linkElements.forEach(function(el){ el.setAttribute('href', result_url); });
          // Gera QR Codes
          var qrCodeElements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-qrcode="' + contextKey + '"]');
          qrCodeElements.forEach(function(element, index) {
            if (!element.id) element.id = "af_qrcode_" + contextKey + "_" + index;
            window.AF_SMART_SCRIPT.displayQrCode(element.id, { clickURL: result_url, codeColor: "#000000" });
          });
        }
      });
    });
  });
})();
</script>

<script async>
  // version: 1.0.3
  // Changing short links to APIV2

  const API_V2_URL = "https://api.infinitepay.io/v2";
  const REFERRAL_DISCOUNT_URL = (docNumber) =>
    `${API_V2_URL}/coupons/${docNumber}`;
  const SHORTEN_SLUG_URL = (slug) => `${API_V2_URL}/l/${slug}`;
  const SLUG_MAX_LENGTH = 6;

  let discount = 0;
  let errMsg = "";

  var url_string = window.location.href;

  // Create a URL object
  var url = new URL(url_string);

  // Get the value of the "id" parameter
  var rid = url.searchParams.get("rid");

  const datePlus = (qtd, type, date) => {
    if (!type) {
      type = "d";
    }

    if (!date) {
      date = new Date();
    }

    const increase = {
      d: 0,
      m: 0,
      y: 0,
    };

    increase[type] = qtd;

    return new Date(
      date.getFullYear() + increase.y,
      date.getMonth() + increase.m,
      date.getDate() + increase.d
    );
  };

  const trim = (str) => str.replace(/\D/g, "");

  const getRefIdBySlug = async (slug = "") => {
    const payload = await fetch(SHORTEN_SLUG_URL(slug), {
      headers: {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        Origin: document?.location?.origin,
      },
    })
      .then((response) => response.json())
      .catch((err) => {
        return null;
      });

    const documentNumber =
      payload?.url?.replace(/^(?:.*)\/([\d]+)/, "$1") || "";

    return { isOk: !isNaN(parseInt(documentNumber)), document: documentNumber };
  };

  const getReferral = async (referralId = "") => {
    const url = REFERRAL_DISCOUNT_URL(referralId);
    const payload = await fetch(url, {
      headers: {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        Origin: document.location.origin,
      },
    })
      .then((response) => response.json())
      .catch(() => {
        if (trim(referralId) === "59585488086") {
          return {
            coupon: {
              label: "referral",
              discount: 1500,
              bonus: 0,
              referrer_id: 671345,
              document_number: 59585488086,
            },
          };
        }
        return null;
      });

    return { isOk: !!payload, payload };
  };

  const checkReferral = async (rfID = "") => {
    // Check url params
    if (rfID && rfID !== "null" && rfID !== "undefined") {
      document.cookie = `ifp_rid=${rfID}; expires=${datePlus(
        7
      )}; path=/; domain=.infinitepay.io; secure`;

      const _id = rfID.toString();
      const isSlug = isNaN(parseInt(_id)) || _id.length === SLUG_MAX_LENGTH;
      let sourceID = _id;

      if (isSlug) {
        const result = await getRefIdBySlug(rfID);
        if (result.isOk) {
          sourceID = result.document;
        }
      }

      //Valid referral
      const result = await getReferral(sourceID);
      // Update Cookies
      if (result.isOk && result?.payload?.coupon?.discount) {
        const discountCoupon =
          parseInt(result?.payload?.coupon?.discount) / 100;
        return { isOk: true, payload: discountCoupon };
      } else {
        return {
          isOk: false,
          err: { status: 404, message: "Cupom inválido ou expirado" },
        };
      }
    } else {
      // Check cookies
      const cookie = document.cookie.replace(
        /(?:(?:^|.*;\s*)ifp_rid\s*\=\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$/,
        "$1"
      );
      if (cookie) {
        const result = await getReferral(cookie);
        if (result.isOk && result?.payload?.coupon?.discount) {
          const discountCoupon =
            parseInt(result?.payload?.coupon?.discount) / 100;
          return { isOk: true, payload: discountCoupon };
        }
      }
    }

    return { isOk: false };
  };

  const creatingHTMLElements = () => {
    // Create the main container div for the discount
    const contDiscount = document.createElement("div");
    contDiscount.classList.add("contDiscount");
    contDiscount.id = "contDiscount";

    // Create the text container div within the discount container
    const textCont = document.createElement("div");
    textCont.classList.add("text-cont");

    // Create the text node for the "Você recebeu" text
    const textNode = document.createTextNode("Cupom de ");

    // Create the span element for the discount value
    const discountSpan = document.createElement("span");
    discountSpan.id = "discountText";
    discountSpan.textContent = "R$ {discount} de desconto ativado 🤑";

    // Append the text node and the span element to the text container
    textCont.appendChild(textNode);
    textCont.appendChild(discountSpan);

    // Append the text container to the discount container
    contDiscount.appendChild(textCont);

    // Create the error container div
    const contErrMsg = document.createElement("div");
    contErrMsg.classList.add("contErrMsg");
    contErrMsg.id = "contErrMsg";

    // Create the text container div within the error container
    const textErr = document.createElement("div");
    textErr.classList.add("text-cont");
    textErr.id = "textErr";

    // Append the text container to the error container
    contErrMsg.appendChild(textErr);

    // Get a reference to the <body> element
    const bodyElement = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];

    // Insert the discount container directly after the <body> tag
    bodyElement.insertAdjacentElement("afterbegin", contDiscount);

    // Insert the error container directly after the <body> tag
    bodyElement.insertAdjacentElement("afterbegin", contErrMsg);
  };

  window.onload = async function () {
    creatingHTMLElements();
    var contDiscount = document.getElementById("contDiscount");
    var contErrMsg = document.getElementById("contErrMsg");
    var discountText = document.getElementById("discountText");
    var textErr = document.getElementById("textErr");
    const result = await checkReferral(rid);
    if (result.isOk) {
      contDiscount.classList.add("active");
      discount = String(result.payload);
      discountText.innerHTML = `R$ ${discount} de desconto ativado 🤑`;
    } else if (result?.err) {
      contErrMsg.classList.add("active");
      errMsg = result?.err?.message;
      textErr.innerHTML = errMsg;
    }
  };
</script>

<style>
  body {
    background-color: white;
    font-family: "Cerapro", sans-serif;
    margin: 0 !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
  }

  .contDiscount {
    display: none;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    background-color: rgb(158, 101, 237);
    width: 100%;
    height: 50px;
    top: 0;
  }

  .active {
    display: flex;
  }

  .contErrMsg {
    display: none;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 100%;
    background-color: #ffdb58;
    height: 50px;
    top: 0;
  }

  .text-cont {
    color: white;
    font-size: 16px;
    font-weight: 600;
    text-align: center;
    padding-left: 2%;
    padding-right: 2%;
  }
</style>

<!-- START BROWSER DATA TRACKING -->
<script>
  const API_CONFIG = {
    url: 'https://api.infinitepay.io/growth-data/api/whatsapp_redirect'
  };

  // Get parameters needed for WhatsApp redirect
  // - anonId: Anonymous ID from RudderStack analytics or default 'anonymous'
  // - href: Current page URL without query parameters
  // - utmParams: UTM parameters stored in cookies under 'ifp_search_params'
  const getWhatsappRedirectParams = () => {
    const anonId = window?.rudderanalytics?.getAnonymousId() || 'anonymous';
    const href = window.location.href.split('?')[0] || '';

    // Safer cookie parsing
    let utmParams = {};
    try {
      const cookieString = document.cookie
        .split(';')
        .find(cookie => cookie.trim().startsWith('ifp_search_params='));
      if (cookieString) {
        const cookieValue = cookieString.split('=')[1];
        if (cookieValue) {
          utmParams = JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent(cookieValue));
        }
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.warn('Error parsing UTM params from cookie:', error);
    }

    return { anonId, href, utmParams };
  };

  // Function to get WhatsApp redirect URL by making API request
  // Parameters:
  // - message: Custom message to be sent via WhatsApp (default greeting message in Portuguese)
  // Returns: URL for WhatsApp redirect with tracking parameters
  const getWhatsappUrl = async (message = 'Olá, estou interessado em saber mais sobre a InfinitePay') => {
    const { anonId, href, utmParams } = getWhatsappRedirectParams();
    const phone_number = '5511953255030';

    try {
      const response = await Promise.race([
        fetch(API_CONFIG.url, {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
          },
          body: JSON.stringify({
            anon_id: anonId,
            href,
            ifb_params: utmParams,
            message
          }),
        }),
        new Promise((_, reject) => setTimeout(() => reject(new Error('Timeout')), 2000))
      ]);

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);
      }

      const data = await response.json();

      // Log successful event
      if (window?.rudderanalytics) {
        window.rudderanalytics.track("WhatsApp Conversation", {
          action: "clicked",
          phone_number,
          href,
          chat_id: data.chat_id,
          ifb_params: utmParams
        });
      }

      return data.redirect_url;

    } catch (error) {
      // Log error event
      if (window?.rudderanalytics) {
        window.rudderanalytics.track("WhatsApp Conversation", {
          action: "error",
          phone_number,
          href,
          chat_id: null,
          ifb_params: utmParams,
          error: error.message
        });
      }
      console.error('Error generating WhatsApp URL:', error);
      return `https://wa.me/${phone_number}?text=${encodeURIComponent(message)}`;
    }
  };

  // Add mobile device detection
  const isMobileOrSafari = () => {
    return /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|Safari|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent);
  };

  // Initialize WhatsApp widget by adding click event listener to button
  const initWhatsappWidget = () => {
    // Get WhatsApp button element
    const whatsappButtons = document.querySelectorAll('#whatsapp-button');
    // Return early if button not found
    if (!whatsappButtons) return;
    // Add click event listener to handle WhatsApp redirect
    whatsappButtons.forEach(whatsappButton => {
      whatsappButton.addEventListener('click', async (event) => {
        event.preventDefault();
        // Get custom message from data attribute or use default
        const customMessage = whatsappButton.getAttribute('data-message') || 'Olá, estou interessado em saber mais sobre a InfinitePay';
        // Get WhatsApp URL with tracking parameters
        const url = await getWhatsappUrl(customMessage);

        if (isMobileOrSafari()) {
          // For mobile, directly change window location
          window.location.href = url;
        } else {
          // For desktop, open in new tab
          window.open(url, '_blank');
        }
      });
    });
  };

  // Initialize WhatsApp widget when DOM content is fully loaded
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initWhatsappWidget);
</script>

    const match = content.match(/^(\D*)(-?\d+(?:\.\d+)?)(\D*)$/);
    if (match) {
        return {
            prefix: match[1],
            number: parseFloat(match[2]),
            suffix: match[3]
        };
    }
    return { prefix: '', number: 0, suffix: '' };
}

// Função para animar o número
function animateNumber(element, target, duration, isDecimal) {
    let start = null;
    const { prefix, number: startValue, suffix } = extractNumberAndText(element);

    function step(timestamp) {
        if (!start) start = timestamp;
        const progress = Math.min((timestamp - start) / duration, 1);
        const current = startValue + progress * (target - startValue);

        const formattedNumber = isDecimal ? current.toFixed(1) : Math.floor(current);
        element.textContent = `${prefix}${formattedNumber}${suffix}`;

        if (progress < 1) {
            window.requestAnimationFrame(step);
        }
    }

    window.requestAnimationFrame(step);
}

// Função principal que será chamada quando o DOM estiver pronto
function initAnimatedNumbers() {
    const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.animated-number');
    
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                const el = entry.target;
                const target = parseFloat(el.getAttribute('count-target'));
                const duration = parseInt(el.getAttribute('count-duration'));
                const delay = parseInt(el.getAttribute('count-delay'));
                const isDecimal = el.getAttribute('count-decimal') === 'true';
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    animateNumber(el, target, duration, isDecimal);
                }, delay);
                
                observer.unobserve(el);
            }
        });
    }, { threshold: 1 });

    elements.forEach(el => observer.observe(el));
}

// Verifica se o documento já está pronto ou se precisa esperar o evento DOMContentLoaded
if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initAnimatedNumbers);
} else {
    initAnimatedNumbers();
}

<!-- END FAQ SCHEMA MARKUP --></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Quais as vantagens da InfinitePay?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>As principais vantagens da InfinitePay incluem:</p><p>‍</p><ol role="list"><li>Oferecemos taxas até 50% menores que a concorrência para transações com cartões.</li><li>Pix com taxa zero, tanto para transferências quanto para vendas pela maquininha, garantindo ainda mais economia para o seu negócio.</li><li>Disponibilizamos opções de recebimento imediato ou em 1 dia útil.</li><li>Aceitamos pagamentos por aproximação, Pix e diversas bandeiras de cartões.</li><li>Oferecemos conta PJ, cartão com 1,5% de cashback, empréstimos personalizado, link de pagamento e muito mais.</li><li>Sistema intuitivo e moderno para gestão de vendas e estoque.</li><li>Alto índice de satisfação e resolução de problemas no atendimento ao cliente, com selo Reclame Aqui RA1000.</li><li>Sem cobrança de mensalidades, reduzindo os custos fixos para nossos usuários.</li></ol></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">A InfinitePay é confiável?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>Sim, a InfinitePay é confiável. Possuímos uma boa reputação no Reclame Aqui, com o selo RA1000, que atesta um bom índice de atendimento. Também resolvemos mais de 90% das reclamações, com mais de 85% dos consumidores afirmando que voltariam a fazer negócios conosco. Além disso, somos autorizados pelo Banco Central a atuar como instituição de pagamento, reforçando a credibilidade.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Quais são os valores das taxas da InfinitePay?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>As taxas da InfinitePay variam conforme faturamento, tipo de transação e bandeira. Confira:</p><p>‍</p><p>Maquininha e InfiniteTap:</p><ul role="list"><li>Débito: A partir de 0,75%</li><li>Crédito à vista: A partir de 2,69%</li><li>Crédito 12x: A partir de 8,99%</li><li>Pix: taxa zero</li><li>Boleto: taxa zero</li></ul><p>‍</p><p>Link, Gestão de Cobranças e Loja Online:</p><ul role="list"><li>Crédito à vista: A partir de 4,20%</li><li>Crédito 12x: A partir de 16,66%</li><li>Pix: taxa zero</li><li>Boleto: taxa zero</li></ul><p>‍</p><p><a href="https://www.infinitepay.io/taxas">Confira todas as taxas da InfinitePay</a></p><p>‍</p></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Porque a InfinitePay oferece taxas tão baratas?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>A InfinitePay consegue oferecer taxas tão baixas devido a alguns fatores principais:<br/>‍</p><ol start="" role="list"><li>Uso de tecnologias avançadas: Utilizamos blockchain e inteligência artificial, reduzindo significativamente os custos operacionais e de mão de obra.</li><li>Sistema baseado em nuvem: Isso permite uma infraestrutura mais enxuta e econômica.</li><li>Modelo de negócio focado em volume: Visamos crescer com nossos clientes, oferecendo taxas menores para faturamentos maiores.<br/></li><li> Ausência de taxas promocionais temporárias: Em vez de oferecer promoções de curto prazo, mantemos taxas consistentemente baixas.</li></ol></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Como vender com a InfinitePay?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>Para vender com a InfinitePay <a href="https://buy.infinitepay.io/" class="o-faq-hyperlink-text">basta se cadastrar no checkout</a> e escolher qual serviço você deseja. Alguns são:</p><p>‍</p><ol start="" role="list"><li>Maquininha: Permite vendas no Pix, débito e no crédito à vista ou parcelado, inserindo o cartão ou por aproximação (NFC).</li><li>InfiniteTap: Transforma seu celular com NFC em uma maquininha de cartão, permitindo vendas em qualquer lugar usando apenas o smartphone.</li><li>Link de pagamento: Você pode criar e compartilhar links de cobrança com seus clientes via WhatsApp, e-mail e por toda a internet.</li><li>Pix: Receba pagamentos instantâneos com Pix, diretamente em sua conta InfinitePay, com taxa zero e confirmação imediata.</li><li>Gestão de cobrança: Utilize nossas ferramentas para automatizar e gerenciar cobranças recorrentes, facilitando o acompanhamento de recebíveis.<br/></li><li>Loja online: Crie sua própria loja virtual e aceite pagamentos diretamente por Pix, cartão ou outros métodos, integrando tudo na plataforma InfinitePay.</li></ol></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Tem InfinitePay para CPF?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>Sim, a InfinitePay oferece a opção de uso para pessoas físicas através do InfiniteTap. Isso permite que indivíduos que não possuem CNPJ possam realizar vendas utilizando seu CPF, transformando seus smartphones em maquininhas de cartão.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Qual o limite do cartão da InfinitePay?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>O Cartão Virtual Inteligente da InfinitePay não possui um limite de crédito tradicional como os cartões de crédito comuns. Ele funciona como um cartão pré-pago,<strong> onde o limite disponível para uso é determinado pelo saldo existente na sua conta digital InfinitePay</strong>.<br/><br/>Você pode usar o dinheiro disponível no seu aplicativo InfinitePay como saldo do cartão e, quando necessário, adicionar mais fundos à sua conta via Pix para aumentar o valor disponível para gastos. <br/><br/>Essa é uma alternativa segura e fácil para movimentar o seu saldo em conta! Nosso cartão também possui um programa de cashback de 1,5% limitado a R$ 20.000 em compras a cada 30 dias.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Qual celular é compatível com a InfinitePay?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>Para utilizar o aplicativo InfinitePay, seu dispositivo precisa atender aos seguintes requisitos:<br/>‍</p><ul role="list"><li>Android: É necessário ter um sistema operacional Android 10 ou superior.<br/></li><li>iOS: O aplicativo está disponível para iPhones a partir do modelo XS, com iOS 16.7 ou superior.</li></ul><p>O InfiniteTap, que transforma o celular em uma maquininha de cartão, requer os mesmos requisitos além de NFC.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Quanto custa uma maquininha da InfinitePay?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>A Maquininha Smart da InfinitePay custa 12x de R$ 16,58 (este preço se aplica à compra da primeira maquininha).</p><p>‍</p><p>Diferente de outras empresas do mercado, que oferecem uma variedade de maquininhas para diferentes tamanhos de negócio, a InfinitePay só trabalha com a InfiniteSmart: a máquina de cartão mais avançada do mercado, que tem taxas fixas independente do limite de faturamento.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">A InfinitePay aceita quais bandeiras?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>A InfinitePay aceita diversas bandeiras de cartões, incluindo Visa, Mastercard, Elo, Hiper e American Express.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">A InfinitePay aceita vale-alimentação?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>Não, a InfinitePay não aceita cartões de vale-alimentação ou vale-refeição. Oferecemos a possibilidade de receber pagamentos com cartões de crédito e débito das principais bandeiras, além de Pix.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Quanto tempo leva para o dinheiro cair na InfinitePay?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>A InfinitePay oferece dois planos de recebimento:</p><p>‍</p><ol start="" role="list"><li>Recebimento na hora<br/></li><li>Recebimento em 1 dia útil</li></ol><p>O cliente pode escolher o plano que melhor atende às suas necessidades. Caso opte pelo plano de recebimento em 1 dia útil, é possível alterar temporariamente para recebimento na hora diretamente pelo aplicativo, quando necessário, como em finais de semana e feriados</p></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Onde cai o dinheiro da InfinitePay?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>Os valores das vendas realizadas com a InfinitePay são enviados para a Conta Inteligente da InfinitePay, que pode ser acessada através do aplicativo. A partir daí, os usuários podem transferir o saldo para qualquer outra conta bancária via Pix, sem taxas ou limites de transferência, ou optar por movimentar o saldo utilizando o cartão da InfinitePay.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="faq_item-wrap"><div class="faq_dropdown-item is-title"><h3 class="faq_heading">Como ligar para InfinitePay?</h3><div class="accordion-icon_component"><div class="accordion-icon_horizontal-line"></div><div class="accordion-icon_vertical-line"></div></div></div><div class="faq_answer"><div class="faq_answer-item"><div class="faq_paragraph w-richtext"><p>Para entrar em contato com a InfinitePay, utilize o suporte disponível diretamente no aplicativo, onde um chat permite que você fale diretamente com nossa equipe de suporte.</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></section></main><footer data-utm="FOOTER" class="section_large footer"><div class="footer-dropshadow"></div><div class="o-container-regular <!-- START BROWSER DATA TRACKING -->
<script>
  const API_CONFIG = {
    url: 'https://api.infinitepay.io/growth-data/api/whatsapp_redirect'
  };

  // Get parameters needed for WhatsApp redirect
  // - anonId: Anonymous ID from RudderStack analytics or default 'anonymous'
  // - href: Current page URL without query parameters
  // - utmParams: UTM parameters stored in cookies under 'ifp_search_params'
  const getWhatsappRedirectParams = () => {
    const anonId = window?.rudderanalytics?.getAnonymousId() || 'anonymous';
    const href = window.location.href.split('?')[0] || '';

    // Safer cookie parsing
    let utmParams = {};
    try {
      const cookieString = document.cookie
        .split(';')
        .find(cookie => cookie.trim().startsWith('ifp_search_params='));
      if (cookieString) {
        const cookieValue = cookieString.split('=')[1];
        if (cookieValue) {
          utmParams = JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent(cookieValue));
        }
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.warn('Error parsing UTM params from cookie:', error);
    }

    return { anonId, href, utmParams };
  };

  // Function to get WhatsApp redirect URL by making API request
  // Parameters:
  // - message: Custom message to be sent via WhatsApp (default greeting message in Portuguese)
  // Returns: URL for WhatsApp redirect with tracking parameters
  const getWhatsappUrl = async (message = 'Olá, estou interessado em saber mais sobre a InfinitePay') => {
    const { anonId, href, utmParams } = getWhatsappRedirectParams();
    const phone_number = '5511953255030';

    try {
      const response = await Promise.race([
        fetch(API_CONFIG.url, {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
          },
          body: JSON.stringify({
            anon_id: anonId,
            href,
            ifb_params: utmParams,
            message
          }),
        }),
        new Promise((_, reject) => setTimeout(() => reject(new Error('Timeout')), 2000))
      ]);

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);
      }

      const data = await response.json();

      // Log successful event
      if (window?.rudderanalytics) {
        window.rudderanalytics.track("WhatsApp Conversation", {
          action: "clicked",
          phone_number,
          href,
          chat_id: data.chat_id,
          ifb_params: utmParams
        });
      }

      return data.redirect_url;

    } catch (error) {
      // Log error event
      if (window?.rudderanalytics) {
        window.rudderanalytics.track("WhatsApp Conversation", {
          action: "error",
          phone_number,
          href,
          chat_id: null,
          ifb_params: utmParams,
          error: error.message
        });
      }
      console.error('Error generating WhatsApp URL:', error);
      return `https://wa.me/${phone_number}?text=${encodeURIComponent(message)}`;
    }
  };

  // Add mobile device detection
  const isMobileOrSafari = () => {
    return /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|Safari|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent);
  };

  // Initialize WhatsApp widget by adding click event listener to button
  const initWhatsappWidget = () => {
    // Get WhatsApp button element
    const whatsappButtons = document.querySelectorAll('#whatsapp-button');
    // Return early if button not found
    if (!whatsappButtons) return;
    // Add click event listener to handle WhatsApp redirect
    whatsappButtons.forEach(whatsappButton => {
      whatsappButton.addEventListener('click', async (event) => {
        event.preventDefault();
        // Get custom message from data attribute or use default
        const customMessage = whatsappButton.getAttribute('data-message') || 'Olá, estou interessado em saber mais sobre a InfinitePay';
        // Get WhatsApp URL with tracking parameters
        const url = await getWhatsappUrl(customMessage);

        if (isMobileOrSafari()) {
          // For mobile, directly change window location
          window.location.href = url;
        } else {
          // For desktop, open in new tab
          window.open(url, '_blank');
        }
      });
    });
  };

  // Initialize WhatsApp widget when DOM content is fully loaded
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initWhatsappWidget);
</script>

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery.mask/1.14.16/jquery.mask.min.js"></script>

<script>

// Form Validation Script for Webflow
// Supports: Name, Email, and Phone fields

// Immediate button disabling
(function() {
    const disableButtons = () => {
        document.querySelectorAll('[data-form] form input[type="submit"], [data-form] form button[type="submit"]').forEach(button => {
            button.classList.add('btn-disabled');
            button.style.opacity = '0.5';
            button.style.cursor = 'not-allowed';
        });
    };
    
    disableButtons();
    
    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', disableButtons);
    }
})();

// Feedback functions
function showFieldError(field, message, showMessage = false) {
    const $field = $(field);
    $field.siblings('.error-feedback').remove();
    
    if (showMessage) {
        $field.addClass('field-error');
        $field.after('<div class="error-feedback"><span class="error-asterisk">*</span> ' + message + '</div>');
    } else {
        $field.removeClass('field-error');
    }
}

function showFieldValid(field) {
    const $field = $(field);
    $field.removeClass('field-error');
    $field.siblings('.error-feedback').remove();
}

function clearFieldFeedback(field) {
    const $field = $(field);
    $field.removeClass('field-error');
    $field.siblings('.error-feedback').remove();
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    document.querySelectorAll('[data-form] form input[type="submit"], [data-form] form button[type="submit"]').forEach(button => {
        button.classList.add('btn-disabled');
    });

    const formContainers = document.querySelectorAll('[data-form]');

    formContainers.forEach(formContainer => {
        const form = formContainer.querySelector('form');
        if (!form) return;

        let hasTriedToSubmit = false;
        const $submitButton = $(form).find('input[type="submit"], button[type="submit"]');
        $submitButton.addClass('btn-disabled');

        $submitButton.on('click', function(e) {
            if ($(this).hasClass('btn-disabled')) {
                e.preventDefault();
                hasTriedToSubmit = true;
                validateForm();
                return false;
            }
        });

        const validateForm = () => {
            const $form = $(form);
            let isValid = true;

            $form.find('input[required], select[required], textarea[required]').each(function() {
                const $field = $(this);
                const fieldValue = $field.val().trim();
                
                if (fieldValue === '') {
                    let message = 'Este campo é obrigatório';
                    const dataFormat = $field.attr('data-format');
                    const fieldType = $field.attr('type');
                    
                    if (dataFormat === 'name') {
                        message = 'Qual o seu nome completo?';
                    } else if (fieldType === 'email') {
                        message = 'Preencha com seu melhor email';
                    } else if (dataFormat === 'phone') {
                        message = 'Coloque seu número de telefone';
                    }
                    
                    showFieldError(this, message, hasTriedToSubmit);
                    isValid = false;
                } else {
                    const fieldType = $field.attr('type');
                    const dataFormat = $field.attr('data-format');
                    
                    if (fieldType !== 'email' && dataFormat !== 'name' && dataFormat !== 'phone') {
                        showFieldValid(this);
                    }
                }
            });

            // Email validation
            const $emailField = $form.find('input[type="email"]');
            if ($emailField.length) {
                const emailValue = $emailField.val().trim();
                if (emailValue !== '') {
                    const re = /^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9](?:[a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])?(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9](?:[a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])?)*\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}$/;
                    if (!re.test(emailValue)) {
                        showFieldError($emailField[0], 'Digite um email válido (ex: nome@exemplo.com)', hasTriedToSubmit);
                        isValid = false;
                    } else {
                        // Advanced spam keyword filtering
                        const spamKeywords = ['testing', 'test', 'spam', 'fake', 'dummy', 'example', 'temp', 'disposable', 'throwaway', 'mailinator'];
                        const containsSpamKeyword = spamKeywords.some(keyword => 
                            emailValue.toLowerCase().includes(keyword.toLowerCase())
                        );
                        
                        if (containsSpamKeyword) {
                            showFieldError($emailField[0], 'Por favor, utilize um email válido para receber nossos materiais', hasTriedToSubmit);
                            isValid = false;
                        } else {
                            showFieldValid($emailField[0]);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            // Name validation
            const $nameField = $form.find('input[data-format="name"]');
            if ($nameField.length) {
                const nameValue = $nameField.val().trim();
                if (nameValue !== '') {
                    if (!/^[A-Za-zÀ-ÿ\s]+$/.test(nameValue)) {
                        showFieldError($nameField[0], 'Nome deve conter apenas letras e espaços', hasTriedToSubmit);
                        isValid = false;
                    } else if (nameValue.length < 2) {
                        showFieldError($nameField[0], 'Nome deve ter pelo menos 2 caracteres', hasTriedToSubmit);
                        isValid = false;
                    } else {
                        showFieldValid($nameField[0]);
                    }
                }
            }

            // Phone validation
            const $phoneField = $form.find('input[data-format="phone"]');
            if ($phoneField.length) {
                const phoneValue = $phoneField.val().trim();
                if (phoneValue !== '') {
                    if (!/^\(\d{2}\) \d{4,5}-\d{4}$/.test(phoneValue)) {
                        showFieldError($phoneField[0], 'Telefone deve estar no formato (11) 99999-9999', hasTriedToSubmit);
                        isValid = false;
                    } else {
                        showFieldValid($phoneField[0]);
                    }
                }
            }

            if (isValid) {
                $submitButton.removeClass('btn-disabled');
                $submitButton.css({'opacity': '1', 'cursor': 'pointer'});
            } else {
                $submitButton.addClass('btn-disabled');
                $submitButton.css({'opacity': '0.5', 'cursor': 'not-allowed'});
            }
        };

        $(form).find('input[required], select[required], textarea[required]').on('input change blur', validateForm);
        validateForm();
    });
});

// Input Formatting
function applyMasks() {
    // Phone mask - More robust implementation
    $('input[data-format="phone"]').each(function() {
        var $input = $(this);
        
        // Use keydown event to capture the key before it's processed
        $input.on('keydown', function(e) {
            // Allow navigation keys, backspace, delete
            if (['Backspace', 'Delete', 'ArrowLeft', 'ArrowRight', 'Tab', 'Enter'].includes(e.key)) {
                return;
            }
            
            // Only allow numbers
            if (!/[0-9]/.test(e.key)) {
                e.preventDefault();
                return;
            }
            
            // Get current digits count
            var currentDigits = this.value.replace(/\D/g, '');
            
            // Don't allow more than 11 digits
            if (currentDigits.length >= 11) {
                e.preventDefault();
                return;
            }
        });
        
        $input.on('input', function(e) {
            // Get only the digits
            var digits = this.value.replace(/\D/g, '');
            
            // Limit to 11 digits
            if (digits.length > 11) {
                digits = digits.substring(0, 11);
            }
            
            // Format the number
            var formatted = '';
            
            if (digits.length === 0) {
                formatted = '';
            } else if (digits.length <= 2) {
                formatted = '(' + digits;
            } else if (digits.length <= 7) {
                formatted = '(' + digits.substring(0, 2) + ') ' + digits.substring(2);
            } else {
                formatted = '(' + digits.substring(0, 2) + ') ' + digits.substring(2, 7) + '-' + digits.substring(7);
            }
            
            // Only update if the value actually changed
            if (this.value !== formatted) {
                this.value = formatted;
                
                // Force cursor to the end
                requestAnimationFrame(() => {
                    this.setSelectionRange(formatted.length, formatted.length);
                });
                
                // Trigger form validation after formatting (same pattern as name/email fields)
                const $form = $(this).closest('form');
                if ($form.length) {
                    $form.find('input[required], select[required], textarea[required]').first().trigger('input');
                }
            }
        });
    });

    // Name field
    $('input[data-format="name"]').on('input', function() {
        var value = $(this).val();
        $(this).val(value.replace(/[^A-Za-zÀ-ÿ\s]/g, ''));
        
        const $form = $(this).closest('form');
        if ($form.length) {
            $form.find('input[required], select[required], textarea[required]').first().trigger('input');
        }
    });

    // Email validation trigger
    $('input[type="email"]').on('blur', function() {
        const $form = $(this).closest('form');
        if ($form.length) {
            $form.find('input[required], select[required], textarea[required]').first().trigger('input');
        }
    });
}

// Initialize
$(document).ready(function () {
    $('[data-form] form input[type="submit"], [data-form] form button[type="submit"]').each(function() {
        $(this).addClass('btn-disabled');
        $(this).css({'opacity': '0.5', 'cursor': 'not-allowed'});
    });
    
    applyMasks();

    $('<style>')
        .prop('type', 'text/css')
        .html(`
            .field-error {
                border-color: #ff4444 !important;
                border-width: 1px !important;
                border-style: solid !important;
            }
            
            .error-feedback {
                color: #000000;
                font-size: 14px;
                margin-top: 5px;
                display: block;
                font-weight: 500;
            }
            
            .error-asterisk {
                color: #ff4444;
                font-weight: bold;
            }
            
            .btn-disabled {
                opacity: 0.5 !important;
                cursor: not-allowed !important;
            }
            
            input[type="submit"]:not(.btn-disabled), 
            button[type="submit"]:not(.btn-disabled) {
                opacity: 1 !important;
                cursor: pointer !important;
            }
        `)
        .appendTo('head');
        
    setTimeout(function() {
        $('[data-form] form input[type="submit"], [data-form] form button[type="submit"]').addClass('btn-disabled');
    }, 100);
});

</script></div><script src="https://d3e54v103j8qbb.cloudfront.net/js/jquery-3.5.1.min.dc5e7f18c8.js?site=65c1399ac999a342139b5069" type="text/javascript" integrity="sha256-9/aliU8dGd2tb6OSsuzixeV4y/faTqgFtohetphbbj0=" crossorigin="anonymous"></script><script src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1399ac999a342139b5069/js/lp-infinitepay.752acb60.5453e1cde0330502.js" type="text/javascript"></script><script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/currency.js"></script>

<script src="https://unpkg.com/@amplitude/experiment-js-client@1.9.0/dist/experiment.umd.js"></script>
<script>

    // Exposure event through third-party (RudderStack)
    console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Initializing experiment client');
    window.experiment = Experiment.Experiment.initialize(
        'client-fDWTF1BkkIAbyXaf0qfunpRWN8vvtdo5',
        {
            exposureTrackingProvider: {
                track: (exposure) => {
                    rudderanalytics.track('$exposure', exposure);
                    console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Tracking exposure:', exposure);
                }
            }
        }
    )

    // Fetch experiment session data
    const fetchExperimentSessionData = (userId, anonId) => {
        console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Fetching session data for user:', userId, 'anonymous:', anonId);
        const user = {
            user_id: userId || "",
            device_id: anonId || "",
            user_properties: {
                origin: location.origin,
                href: location.href,
                pathname: location.pathname
            }
        }
        return user
    }

    // Redirect to URL
    const handleRedirectUrl = (url) => {
        console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Redirecting to:', url);
        window.location.href = url;
    }

    const handleExperiments = async () => {
        console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Starting experiment handler');
        // await RudderStack to be ready
        await new Promise(resolve => {
            if (window.rudderanalytics.ready) {
                console.log('[EXPERIMENT] RudderStack already ready');
                resolve();
            } else {
                console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Waiting for RudderStack to be ready');
                window.rudderanalytics.ready(() => {
                    console.log('[EXPERIMENT] RudderStack is now ready');
                    resolve();
                });
            }
        });
        
        const userId = await rudderanalytics.getUserId();
        const anonId = await rudderanalytics.getAnonymousId();
        const user = await fetchExperimentSessionData(userId, anonId);
        console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Starting experiment with user:', user);
        await window.experiment.start(user);

        // Fetch flag keys for user
        console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Fetching flag keys for user');
        const context = { user_properties: user.user_properties };
        
        // Skip API call if there's no user identification
        if (!user.user_id && !user.device_id) {
            console.log('[EXPERIMENT] No user or device ID available, skipping flag fetch');
            return;
        }

        try {
            const encodedContext = encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(context));
            const response = await fetch(
                `https://api.lab.amplitude.com/v1/vardata?` + 
                `user_id=${encodeURIComponent(user.user_id || '')}&` +
                `device_id=${encodeURIComponent(user.device_id || '')}&` +
                `context=${encodedContext}`, 
                {
                    headers: {
                        'Authorization': 'Api-Key client-fDWTF1BkkIAbyXaf0qfunpRWN8vvtdo5'
                    }
                }
            );

            if (!response.ok) {
                throw new Error(`API request failed with status ${response.status}`);
            }

            const flagKeys = await response.json();
            Object.entries(flagKeys).forEach(([key, _]) => {
                window.experiment.variant(key); // Expose the variant
            });
            window.experimentFlagKeys = flagKeys;
            
            // Find the first flag with key="treatment"
            const treatmentFlag = Object.entries(flagKeys).find(([_, value]) => value.key === "treatment");
            console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Received flag keys:', flagKeys);

            if (treatmentFlag) {
                console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Treatment flag detected:', treatmentFlag[0]);
                const url = treatmentFlag[1].payload.url;
                if (location.href.includes(url)) {
                    console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Already on the redirect URL, skipping');
                } else {
                    console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Redirecting to:', url);
                    handleRedirectUrl(url);
                }
            } else {
                console.log('[EXPERIMENT] No treatment flag detected');
            }
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('[EXPERIMENT] Error fetching flag keys:', error);
        }
    }

    // Run experiments
    window.addEventListener("load", () => {
        handleExperiments().catch(error => {
            console.error('[EXPERIMENT] Error handling experiments:', error);
        });
    });
</script>

<script async>
// Original Pen by Matt Smith
const second = 1000,
    minute = second * 60,
    hour = minute * 60,
    day = hour * 24;

function getNextSunday(date) {
    const dayOfWeek = date.getDay();
    const daysToNextSunday = (7 - dayOfWeek) % 7 || 7;

    const nextSunday = new Date(date);
    nextSunday.setDate(date.getDate() + daysToNextSunday);
    nextSunday.setHours(23, 59, 59, 999)

    return nextSunday;
}

let countDown = getNextSunday(new Date()).getTime(),
    x = setInterval(function() {

        let now = new Date().getTime(),
            distance = countDown - now;

        if (distance < 0) {
            countDown = getNextSunday(new Date()).getTime()
        }

        // Validation checks
        let daysElem = document.getElementById('days');
        let hoursElem = document.getElementById('hours');
        let minutesElem = document.getElementById('minutes');
        let secondsElem = document.getElementById('seconds');

        if (!daysElem || !hoursElem || !minutesElem || !secondsElem) {
            return;  // Exit if one of the elements doesn't exist
        }

        daysElem.innerText = Math.floor(distance / (day));
        hoursElem.innerText = Math.floor((distance % (day)) / (hour));
        minutesElem.innerText = Math.floor((distance % (hour)) / (minute));
        secondsElem.innerText = Math.floor((distance % (minute)) / second);

    }, second);

</script>




<script src="https://unpkg.com/gsap@3.12.2/dist/gsap.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://unpkg.com/gsap@3.12.2/dist/ScrollTrigger.min.js"></script>

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger);

    const banner = document.querySelector(".flavia_banner-component");
    const closeBtn = document.querySelector(".flavia_banner-close");

    // Função para definir um cookie com duração em horas
    function setCookie(name, value, hours) {
      const d = new Date();
      d.setTime(d.getTime() + (hours * 60 * 60 * 1000));
      document.cookie = `${name}=${value};expires=${d.toUTCString()};path=/`;
    }

    // Função para obter um cookie
    function getCookie(name) {
      const value = `; ${document.cookie}`;
      const parts = value.split(`; ${name}=`);
      if (parts.length === 2) return parts.pop().split(';').shift();
    }

    // Verifica se o cookie existe
    const hideBanner = getCookie("hide_flavia_banner");

    // Se NÃO houver cookie, ativa a animação
    if (!hideBanner) {
      // Garante estado inicial
      gsap.set(banner, {
        opacity: 0,
        y: 100
      });

      ScrollTrigger.create({
        trigger: document.body,
        start: "top top",
        end: "bottom bottom",
        onUpdate: (self) => {
          if (self.progress >= 0.3) {
            gsap.to(banner, {
              opacity: 1,
              y: 0,
              duration: 1,
              ease: "power3.out"
            });
            self.kill();
          }
        }
      });
    } else {
      // Se cookie existir, esconde o banner permanentemente
      gsap.set(banner, { display: "none" });
    }

    // Clicar no botão de fechar salva o cookie
    if (closeBtn) {
      closeBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
        setCookie("hide_flavia_banner", "true", 24); // 24h
        gsap.to(banner, {
          opacity: 0,
          y: 100,
          duration: 0.6,
          onComplete: () => {
            banner.style.display = "none";
          }
        });
      });
    }
  });
</script>

<!-- ===== Utils: cookies/params/persistência (sem globals) ===== -->
<script>
(function() {
  "use strict";

  // --- Cookie helpers ---
  var getCleanDomain = function() { return location.hostname.replace(/^www\./i, ""); };
  var setCookie = function(name, value, days) {
    if (!name) return;
    var expires = new Date(Date.now() + (days||30)*24*60*60*1000).toUTCString();
    var cleanDomain = getCleanDomain();
    document.cookie = name + "=" + encodeURIComponent(value) + "; SameSite=None; Secure; expires=" + expires + "; path=/; domain=." + cleanDomain;
  };
  var getCookieMap = function() {
    return document.cookie.split("; ").reduce(function(acc, cookie) {
      if (!cookie) return acc;
      var idx = cookie.indexOf("=");
      var key = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(0, idx) : cookie;
      var val = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(idx+1) : "";
      acc[key] = val ? decodeURIComponent(val) : "";
      return acc;
    }, {});
  };

  // --- Storage helpers (resilientes) ---
  var toStringSafe = function(v) {
    if (v == null) return "";
    if (typeof v === "string") return v;
    try { return JSON.stringify(v); } catch(e) { return String(v); }
  };
  var setData = function(name, value) {
    if (!name) return;
    var s = toStringSafe(value);
    if (!s || s.trim() === "") return;
    try { window.sessionStorage.setItem(name, s); } catch(e) {}
    setCookie(name, s, 30);
  };
  var getData = function(name) {
    var v = null;
    try { v = window.sessionStorage.getItem(name); } catch(e) {}
    if (v) return v;
    var cookies = getCookieMap();
    return cookies[name] || null;
  };

  // --- Params helpers ---
  var parseQuery = function(qs) { return Object.fromEntries(new URLSearchParams(qs).entries()); };
  var lower = function(s) { return (s || "").toString().trim().toLowerCase(); };

  // Captura params atuais
  var params = parseQuery(window.location.search);

  // Salva IDs de clique e UTMs relevantes (persistência 30d)
  var clickIds = {
    ifp_ttclid: params.ttclid,
    ifp_fbclid: params.fbclid,
    ifp_gclid: params.gclid,
    ifp_clickid: (lower(params.utm_source) === "kwai" && params.click_id) ? params.click_id : null
  };
  Object.keys(clickIds).forEach(function(k){ if (clickIds[k]) setData(k, clickIds[k]); });
  if (Object.keys(params).length) setData("ifp_search_params", params); // guarda JSON

  // Metadados de página iniciais (opcionalmente úteis a outras integrações)
  setData("lp_origin_path", window.location.pathname);
  setData("ifp_original_url", window.location.pathname);
  setData("ifp_original_title", document.title);
  setData("ifp_original_cookies", document.cookie);

  // Referrer normalizado priorizando UTMs/clickids
  var utmSource = lower(params.utm_source);
  var utmCampaign = lower(params.utm_campaign || params.utm_name);
  var referrerMap = {
    "google": (utmCampaign.includes("youtube") || utmCampaign.includes("demand-gen")) ? "https://www.youtube.com" : "https://www.google.com",
    "fb": "https://m.facebook.com",
    "ig": "https://www.instagram.com",
    "tiktok": "https://www.tiktok.com",
    "kwai": "https://www.kwai.com"
  };
  var referrer = document.referrer || "$direct";
  var hasAdSignals = !!(utmSource || params.gclid || params.fbclid || params.ttclid || params.click_id || params.gbraid || params.wbraid);
  if (hasAdSignals) {
    if (utmSource === "ig" || (params.fbclid && utmSource !== "fb")) {
      referrer = referrerMap["ig"];
    } else if (utmSource === "google" && utmCampaign.includes("youtube")) {
      referrer = referrerMap["google"];
    } else {
      referrer = referrerMap[utmSource] || (utmSource ? ("https://www." + utmSource + ".com") : referrer);
    }
  } else if (referrer !== "$direct") {
    try {
      var refHost = new URL(referrer).hostname;
      if (referrer.startsWith("android-app://") || referrer.includes("safeframe.googlesyndication.com") || refHost.includes("infinitepay.io")) {
        referrer = "$direct";
      }
    } catch(e) { referrer = "$direct"; }
  } else {
    referrer = "$direct";
  }
  setData("ifp_original_referrer", referrer);

  // Expõe apenas um getter leve (opcional); se não quiser nada global, remova:
  window.getIFPPersistedParams = function() {
    var raw = getData("ifp_search_params");
    if (!raw) return {};
    try { return (typeof raw === "string") ? JSON.parse(raw) : raw; } catch(e) { return {}; }
  };

})();
</script>

<!-- ===== Rudder page() robusto + SPA hooks (sem logs) ===== -->
<script>
(function(){
  "use strict";

  // Helpers locais (duplicados para independência de outros blocos)
  var getCookieMap = function() {
    return document.cookie.split("; ").reduce(function(acc, cookie) {
      if (!cookie) return acc;
      var idx = cookie.indexOf("=");
      var key = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(0, idx) : cookie;
      var val = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(idx+1) : "";
      acc[key] = val ? decodeURIComponent(val) : "";
      return acc;
    }, {});
  };
  var parseQuery = function(qs) { return Object.fromEntries(new URLSearchParams(qs).entries()); };
  var lower = function(s) { return (s || "").toString().trim().toLowerCase(); };
  var getPersistedParams = function() {
    var raw = null;
    try { raw = window.sessionStorage.getItem("ifp_search_params"); } catch(e) {}
    if (!raw) {
      var cookies = getCookieMap();
      raw = cookies["ifp_search_params"] || null;
    }
    if (!raw) return {};
    try { return (typeof raw === "string") ? JSON.parse(raw) : raw; } catch(e) { return {}; }
  };

  function buildPagePayload() {
  var cookies = getCookieMap();
  var now = parseQuery(window.location.search);
  var persisted = getPersistedParams();
  var pick = function(k){ return (now[k] != null ? now[k] : persisted[k]) || null; };

  return {
    path: window.location.pathname,
    title: document.title,
    referrer: (cookies["ifp_original_referrer"] && cookies["ifp_original_referrer"].trim() !== "") ? cookies["ifp_original_referrer"] : (document.referrer || "$direct"),
    search: window.location.search,
    url: window.location.href,
    utm_source: pick("utm_source"),
    utm_medium: pick("utm_medium"),
    utm_campaign: pick("utm_campaign") || pick("utm_name"),
    utm_content: pick("utm_content"),
    utm_term: pick("utm_term"),
    ttclid: pick("ttclid"),
    fbclid: pick("fbclid"),
    gclid: pick("gclid"),
    all_cookies: cookies
  };
}

  function sendPage() {
    try {
      var data = buildPagePayload();
      if (window.rudderanalytics && window.rudderanalytics.page) {
        window.rudderanalytics.page(data);
      }
    } catch(e) {}
  }

  // Disparo inicial quando o DOM está pronto
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function(){
    if (window.rudderanalytics && window.rudderanalytics.ready) {
      window.rudderanalytics.ready(function(){ sendPage(); });
    } else {
      sendPage();
    }
  });

  // Hooks de SPA
  (function hookHistory(){
    var push = history.pushState, replace = history.replaceState;
    history.pushState = function() {
      var r = push.apply(this, arguments);
      setTimeout(sendPage, 0);
      return r;
    };
    history.replaceState = function() {
      var r = replace.apply(this, arguments);
      setTimeout(sendPage, 0);
      return r;
    };
    window.addEventListener("popstate", function(){ setTimeout(sendPage, 0); });
  })();

})();
</script>

<!-- ===== AppsFlyer OneLink (logs apenas do carregamento do SmartScript) ===== -->
<script>
(function(){
  "use strict";

  function waitForSmartScript(callback, attempts, delay) {
    attempts = (typeof attempts === "number") ? attempts : 10;
    delay = (typeof delay === "number") ? delay : 300;
    if (window.AF_SMART_SCRIPT && typeof window.AF_SMART_SCRIPT.generateOneLinkURL === "function") {
      console.log("AppsFlyer SmartScript pronto"); // único log permitido
      callback();
    } else if (attempts > 0) {
      setTimeout(function(){ waitForSmartScript(callback, attempts - 1, delay); }, delay);
    } else {
      console.error("AF_SMART_SCRIPT não disponível."); // erro crítico
    }
  }

  // Helpers locais para pegar params/cookies sem depender de __ifp
  var parseQuery = function(qs){ return Object.fromEntries(new URLSearchParams(qs).entries()); };
  var getCookieMap = function(){
    return document.cookie.split("; ").reduce(function(acc, cookie) {
      if (!cookie) return acc;
      var idx = cookie.indexOf("=");
      var key = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(0, idx) : cookie;
      var val = idx >= 0 ? cookie.slice(idx+1) : "";
      acc[key] = val ? decodeURIComponent(val) : "";
      return acc;
    }, {});
  };
  var getPersistedParams = function(){
    var raw = null;
    try { raw = window.sessionStorage.getItem("ifp_search_params"); } catch(e) {}
    if (!raw) {
      var cookies = getCookieMap();
      raw = cookies["ifp_search_params"] || null;
    }
    if (!raw) return {};
    try { return (typeof raw === "string") ? JSON.parse(raw) : raw; } catch(e) { return {}; }
  };

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    waitForSmartScript(function () {
      var now = parseQuery(window.location.search);
      var persisted = getPersistedParams();
      var pick = function(k){ return (now[k] != null ? now[k] : persisted[k]) || null; };

      var oneLinkConfigs = {
        'general': {
          id: 'general',
          oneLinkURL: "https://infinitepay.onelink.me/lpUT",
          webReferrer: "af_channel",
          afParameters: {
            mediaSource: { keys: ["utm_source"], defaultValue: "organic_source" },
            campaign: { keys: ["utm_name","utm_campaign"], defaultValue: "lp_traffic" },
            ad: { keys: ["utm_term"], defaultValue: "lp_download_qrcode" },
            googleClickIdKey: "af_sub1",
            afSub2: { keys: ["fbclid"] },
            adSet: { keys: ["utm_content"], defaultValue: "lp_download" },
            afSub4: {
              keys: [],
              defaultValue: (window.rudderanalytics && typeof rudderanalytics.getAnonymousId === "function")
                  ? rudderanalytics.getAnonymousId()
                  : "unknown_id"
            },
            afCustom: [{ paramKey: "af_ss_ui", defaultValue: "true" }]
          }
        },
        'blog-general': {
          id: 'blog-general',
          oneLinkURL: "https://infinitepay.onelink.me/lpUT",
          webReferrer: "af_channel",
          afParameters: {
            mediaSource: { keys: ["utm_source"], defaultValue: "organic_source" },
            campaign: { keys: ["utm_name","utm_campaign"], defaultValue: "blog_header" },
            ad: { keys: ["utm_term"], defaultValue: "lp_download_qrcode" },
            googleClickIdKey: "af_sub1",
            afSub2: { keys: ["fbclid"] },
            adSet: { keys: ["utm_content"], defaultValue: "lp_download" },
            afSub4: {
              keys: [],
              defaultValue: (window.rudderanalytics && typeof rudderanalytics.getAnonymousId === "function")
                  ? rudderanalytics.getAnonymousId()
                  : "unknown_id"
            },
            afCustom: [{ paramKey: "af_ss_ui", defaultValue: "true" }]
          }
        }
      };

      Object.keys(oneLinkConfigs).forEach(function (contextKey) {
        var config = oneLinkConfigs[contextKey];
        var result = window.AF_SMART_SCRIPT.generateOneLinkURL({
          oneLinkURL: config.oneLinkURL,
          webReferrer: config.webReferrer,
          afParameters: config.afParameters
        });
        if (result && result.clickURL) {
          var result_url = result.clickURL;
          // Atualiza anchors com data-onelink="contextKey"
          var linkElements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-onelink="' + contextKey + '"]');
          linkElements.forEach(function(el){ el.setAttribute('href', result_url); });
          // Gera QR Codes
          var qrCodeElements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-qrcode="' + contextKey + '"]');
          qrCodeElements.forEach(function(element, index) {
            if (!element.id) element.id = "af_qrcode_" + contextKey + "_" + index;
            window.AF_SMART_SCRIPT.displayQrCode(element.id, { clickURL: result_url, codeColor: "#000000" });
          });
        }
      });
    });
  });
})();
</script>

<!-- START BROWSER DATA TRACKING -->
<script>
  const API_CONFIG = {
    url: 'https://api.infinitepay.io/growth-data/api/whatsapp_redirect'
  };

  // Get parameters needed for WhatsApp redirect
  // - anonId: Anonymous ID from RudderStack analytics or default 'anonymous'
  // - href: Current page URL without query parameters
  // - utmParams: UTM parameters stored in cookies under 'ifp_search_params'
  const getWhatsappRedirectParams = () => {
    const anonId = window?.rudderanalytics?.getAnonymousId() || 'anonymous';
    const href = window.location.href.split('?')[0] || '';

    // Safer cookie parsing
    let utmParams = {};
    try {
      const cookieString = document.cookie
        .split(';')
        .find(cookie => cookie.trim().startsWith('ifp_search_params='));
      if (cookieString) {
        const cookieValue = cookieString.split('=')[1];
        if (cookieValue) {
          utmParams = JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent(cookieValue));
        }
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.warn('Error parsing UTM params from cookie:', error);
    }

    return { anonId, href, utmParams };
  };

  // Function to get WhatsApp redirect URL by making API request
  // Parameters:
  // - message: Custom message to be sent via WhatsApp (default greeting message in Portuguese)
  // Returns: URL for WhatsApp redirect with tracking parameters
  const getWhatsappUrl = async (message = 'Olá, estou interessado em saber mais sobre a InfinitePay') => {
    const { anonId, href, utmParams } = getWhatsappRedirectParams();
    const phone_number = '5511953255030';

    try {
      const response = await Promise.race([
        fetch(API_CONFIG.url, {
          method: 'POST',
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json'
          },
          body: JSON.stringify({
            anon_id: anonId,
            href,
            ifb_params: utmParams,
            message
          }),
        }),
        new Promise((_, reject) => setTimeout(() => reject(new Error('Timeout')), 2000))
      ]);

      if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);
      }

      const data = await response.json();

      // Log successful event
      if (window?.rudderanalytics) {
        window.rudderanalytics.track("WhatsApp Conversation", {
          action: "clicked",
          phone_number,
          href,
          chat_id: data.chat_id,
          ifb_params: utmParams
        });
      }

      return data.redirect_url;

    } catch (error) {
      // Log error event
      if (window?.rudderanalytics) {
        window.rudderanalytics.track("WhatsApp Conversation", {
          action: "error",
          phone_number,
          href,
          chat_id: null,
          ifb_params: utmParams,
          error: error.message
        });
      }
      console.error('Error generating WhatsApp URL:', error);
      return `https://wa.me/${phone_number}?text=${encodeURIComponent(message)}`;
    }
  };

  // Add mobile device detection
  const isMobileOrSafari = () => {
    return /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|Safari|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent);
  };

  // Initialize WhatsApp widget by adding click event listener to button
  const initWhatsappWidget = () => {
    // Get WhatsApp button element
    const whatsappButtons = document.querySelectorAll('#whatsapp-button');
    // Return early if button not found
    if (!whatsappButtons) return;
    // Add click event listener to handle WhatsApp redirect
    whatsappButtons.forEach(whatsappButton => {
      whatsappButton.addEventListener('click', async (event) => {
        event.preventDefault();
        // Get custom message from data attribute or use default
        const customMessage = whatsappButton.getAttribute('data-message') || 'Olá, estou interessado em saber mais sobre a InfinitePay';
        // Get WhatsApp URL with tracking parameters
        const url = await getWhatsappUrl(customMessage);

        if (isMobileOrSafari()) {
          // For mobile, directly change window location
          window.location.href = url;
        } else {
          // For desktop, open in new tab
          window.open(url, '_blank');
        }
      });
    });
  };

  // Initialize WhatsApp widget when DOM content is fully loaded
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initWhatsappWidget);
</script>
