<script>

// Newsletter Form Validation Script
// Simple validation for forms with data-form="email" and data-form="submit"

// Disable submit button on page load
(function() {
    const disableButtons = () => {
        document.querySelectorAll('[data-form="submit"]').forEach(button => {
            button.classList.add('newsletter-btn-disabled');
            button.style.setProperty('opacity', '0.5', 'important');
            button.style.setProperty('cursor', 'not-allowed', 'important');
            button.style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'none', 'important');
        });
    };
    
    disableButtons();
    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', disableButtons);
    }
    
    // Additional safety check
    setTimeout(disableButtons, 100);
})();

// Feedback functions
function showError(field, message, show = false) {
    const $field = $(field);
    $field.siblings('.newsletter-error').remove();
    
    if (show) {
        $field.addClass('newsletter-field-error');
        $field.after('<div class="newsletter-error">* ' + message + '</div>');
    } else {
        $field.removeClass('newsletter-field-error');
    }
}

function showValid(field) {
    const $field = $(field);
    $field.removeClass('newsletter-field-error');
    $field.siblings('.newsletter-error').remove();
}

$(document).ready(function() {
    // Ensure buttons start disabled
    $('[data-form="submit"]').each(function() {
        $(this).addClass('newsletter-btn-disabled');
        this.style.setProperty('opacity', '0.5', 'important');
        this.style.setProperty('cursor', 'not-allowed', 'important');
        this.style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'none', 'important');
    });
    
    // Find forms with our custom attributes
    $('[data-form="email"]').each(function() {
        const $emailField = $(this);
        const $form = $emailField.closest('form');
        const $submitButton = $form.find('[data-form="submit"]');
        
        if (!$submitButton.length) return;
        
        let hasTriedToSubmit = false;
        
        // Handle submit button click
        $submitButton.on('click', function(e) {
            if ($(this).hasClass('newsletter-btn-disabled')) {
                e.preventDefault();
                hasTriedToSubmit = true;
                validateForm();
                return false;
            }
        });
        
        // Validation function
        const validateForm = () => {
            const emailValue = $emailField.val().trim();
            let isValid = true;
            
            if (emailValue === '') {
                showError($emailField[0], 'Digite seu melhor email', hasTriedToSubmit);
                isValid = false;
            } else {
                // Email format validation
                const emailRegex = /^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9](?:[a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])?(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9](?:[a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])?)*\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}$/;
                
                if (!emailRegex.test(emailValue)) {
                    showError($emailField[0], 'Digite um email válido', hasTriedToSubmit);
                    isValid = false;
                } else {
                    // Spam protection
                    const spamKeywords = ['testing', 'test', 'spam', 'fake', 'dummy', 'example', 'temp', 'disposable', 'throwaway', 'mailinator'];
                    const containsSpam = spamKeywords.some(keyword => 
                        emailValue.toLowerCase().includes(keyword.toLowerCase())
                    );
                    
                    if (containsSpam) {
                        showError($emailField[0], 'Por favor, utilize um email válido', hasTriedToSubmit);
                        isValid = false;
                    } else {
                        showValid($emailField[0]);
                    }
                }
            }
            
            // Enable/disable button
            if (isValid) {
                $submitButton.removeClass('newsletter-btn-disabled');
                $submitButton[0].style.setProperty('opacity', '1', 'important');
                $submitButton[0].style.setProperty('cursor', 'pointer', 'important');
                $submitButton[0].style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'auto', 'important');
            } else {
                $submitButton.addClass('newsletter-btn-disabled');
                $submitButton[0].style.setProperty('opacity', '0.5', 'important');
                $submitButton[0].style.setProperty('cursor', 'not-allowed', 'important');
                $submitButton[0].style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'none', 'important');
            }
        };
        
        // Bind validation to email field
        $emailField.on('input change blur', validateForm);
        
        // Run validation immediately to set initial state
        validateForm();
    });
    
    // Add simple CSS
    $('<style>').html(`
        .newsletter-field-error {
            border-color: #ff4444 !important;
        }
        .newsletter-error {
            color: #ffffff;
            font-size: 14px;
            margin-top: 5px;
        }
        .newsletter-btn-disabled {
            opacity: 0.5 !important;
            cursor: not-allowed !important;
            pointer-events: none !important;
        }
    `).appendTo('head');
});

</script></div></div></div></div><div class="blog_lead-form-image-wrapper hide-mobile"><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1399ac999a342139b5069/66ac00eb536f3143aec0bbe4_image%20(15).avif" srcset="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1399ac999a342139b5069/66ac00eb536f3143aec0bbe4_image%20(15)-p-500.avif 500w, https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65c1399ac999a342139b5069/66ac00eb536f3143aec0bbe4_image%20(15).avif 902w" sizes="(max-width: 902px) 100vw, 902px" height="Auto" alt="" class="blog_lead-form-image"/></div></div></div></div></section><div class="section_showroom"><div class="padding-global"><div class="container-large"><div class="padding-section-medium"><div class="showroom_bento"><a id="w-node-ebafe0c9-831d-c127-9b39-b4fc79cc51aa-139b5086" href="/maquininha" class="showroom_bento-card main w-inline-block"><div class="showroom_card-content"><div class="showroom_title-wrapper"><p class="text-size-regular text-weight-normal text-style-allcaps text-color-neutral-700">maquininha smart</p><h3 class="heading-style-h3">Perfeita para vender, receber e crescer</h3></div><p class="text-size-regular text-weight-normal text-color-neutral-700">Maquininha com as menores para receber na hora ou em 1 dia útil</p><div class="button is-secondary is-icon text-color-purple"><div>Conheça a Maquininha</div><div class="button_textonly-icon w-embed"><svg width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 18 14" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

        footerButtons.forEach(button => {
            button.classList.add('footer-btn-disabled');
            button.style.setProperty('opacity', '0.5', 'important');
            button.style.setProperty('cursor', 'not-allowed', 'important');
            button.style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'none', 'important');
        });
    };
    
    disableFooterButtons();
    if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', disableFooterButtons);
    }
    
    // Additional safety check
    setTimeout(disableFooterButtons, 100);
})();

// No feedback messages - silent validation

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Ensure footer buttons start disabled
    const footerButtons = document.querySelectorAll('footer form input[type="submit"], footer form button[type="submit"], .footer form input[type="submit"], .footer form button[type="submit"]');
    footerButtons.forEach(button => {
        button.classList.add('footer-btn-disabled');
        button.style.setProperty('opacity', '0.5', 'important');
        button.style.setProperty('cursor', 'not-allowed', 'important');
        button.style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'none', 'important');
    });
    
    // Target footer newsletter forms
    const footerForms = document.querySelectorAll('footer form, .footer form');
    
    footerForms.forEach(form => {
        const emailField = form.querySelector('input[type="email"]');
        const submitButton = form.querySelector('input[type="submit"], button[type="submit"]');
        
        if (!emailField || !submitButton) return;
        
        let hasTriedToSubmit = false;
        
        // Handle submit button click
        submitButton.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (this.classList.contains('footer-btn-disabled')) {
                e.preventDefault();
                hasTriedToSubmit = true;
                validateFooterForm();
                return false;
            }
        });
        
        // Validation function
        const validateFooterForm = () => {
            const emailValue = emailField.value.trim();
            let isValid = true;
            
            // Email validation
            if (emailValue === '') {
                isValid = false;
            } else {
                // Email format validation
                const emailRegex = /^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9](?:[a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])?(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9](?:[a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,61}[a-zA-Z0-9])?)*\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}$/;
                
                if (!emailRegex.test(emailValue)) {
                    isValid = false;
                } else {
                    // Spam protection
                    const spamKeywords = ['testing', 'test', 'spam', 'fake', 'dummy', 'example', 'temp', 'disposable', 'throwaway', 'mailinator'];
                    const containsSpam = spamKeywords.some(keyword => 
                        emailValue.toLowerCase().includes(keyword.toLowerCase())
                    );
                    
                    if (containsSpam) {
                        isValid = false;
                    }
                }
            }
            
            // Enable/disable button
            if (isValid) {
                submitButton.classList.remove('footer-btn-disabled');
                submitButton.style.setProperty('opacity', '1', 'important');
                submitButton.style.setProperty('cursor', 'pointer', 'important');
                submitButton.style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'auto', 'important');
            } else {
                submitButton.classList.add('footer-btn-disabled');
                submitButton.style.setProperty('opacity', '0.5', 'important');
                submitButton.style.setProperty('cursor', 'not-allowed', 'important');
                submitButton.style.setProperty('pointer-events', 'none', 'important');
            }
        };
        
        // Bind validation to email field
        emailField.addEventListener('input', validateFooterForm);
        emailField.addEventListener('change', validateFooterForm);
        emailField.addEventListener('blur', validateFooterForm);
        
        // Run validation immediately to set initial state
        validateFooterForm();
    });
    
    // Add simple CSS
    const style = document.createElement('style');
    style.textContent = `
        .footer-btn-disabled {
            opacity: 0.5 !important;
            cursor: not-allowed !important;
            pointer-events: none !important;
        }
    `;
    document.head.appendChild(style);
});

</script></div><div class="o-footer-link is-smaller">Receba no seu e-mail tudo o que você precisa para gerenciar seu negócio. <script src="https://unpkg.com/@amplitude/experiment-js-client@1.9.0/dist/experiment.umd.js"></script>
<script>

    // Exposure event through third-party (RudderStack)
    console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Initializing experiment client');
    window.experiment = Experiment.Experiment.initialize(
        'client-fDWTF1BkkIAbyXaf0qfunpRWN8vvtdo5',
        {
            exposureTrackingProvider: {
                track: (exposure) => {
                    rudderanalytics.track('$exposure', exposure);
                    console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Tracking exposure:', exposure);
                }
            }
        }
    )

    // Fetch experiment session data
    const fetchExperimentSessionData = (userId, anonId) => {
        console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Fetching session data for user:', userId, 'anonymous:', anonId);
        const user = {
            user_id: userId || "",
            device_id: anonId || "",
            user_properties: {
                origin: location.origin,
                href: location.href,
                pathname: location.pathname
            }
        }
        return user
    }

    // Redirect to URL
    const handleRedirectUrl = (url) => {
        console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Redirecting to:', url);
        window.location.href = url;
    }

    const handleExperiments = async () => {
        console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Starting experiment handler');
        // await RudderStack to be ready
        await new Promise(resolve => {
            if (window.rudderanalytics.ready) {
                console.log('[EXPERIMENT] RudderStack already ready');
                resolve();
            } else {
                console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Waiting for RudderStack to be ready');
                window.rudderanalytics.ready(() => {
                    console.log('[EXPERIMENT] RudderStack is now ready');
                    resolve();
                });
            }
        });
        
        const userId = await rudderanalytics.getUserId();
        const anonId = await rudderanalytics.getAnonymousId();
        const user = await fetchExperimentSessionData(userId, anonId);
        console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Starting experiment with user:', user);
        await window.experiment.start(user);

        // Fetch flag keys for user
        console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Fetching flag keys for user');
        const context = { user_properties: user.user_properties };
        
        // Skip API call if there's no user identification
        if (!user.user_id && !user.device_id) {
            console.log('[EXPERIMENT] No user or device ID available, skipping flag fetch');
            return;
        }

        try {
            const encodedContext = encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(context));
            const response = await fetch(
                `https://api.lab.amplitude.com/v1/vardata?` + 
                `user_id=${encodeURIComponent(user.user_id || '')}&` +
                `device_id=${encodeURIComponent(user.device_id || '')}&` +
                `context=${encodedContext}`, 
                {
                    headers: {
                        'Authorization': 'Api-Key client-fDWTF1BkkIAbyXaf0qfunpRWN8vvtdo5'
                    }
                }
            );

            if (!response.ok) {
                throw new Error(`API request failed with status ${response.status}`);
            }

            const flagKeys = await response.json();
            Object.entries(flagKeys).forEach(([key, _]) => {
                window.experiment.variant(key); // Expose the variant
            });
            window.experimentFlagKeys = flagKeys;
            
            // Find the first flag with key="treatment"
            const treatmentFlag = Object.entries(flagKeys).find(([_, value]) => value.key === "treatment");
            console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Received flag keys:', flagKeys);

            if (treatmentFlag) {
                console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Treatment flag detected:', treatmentFlag[0]);
                const url = treatmentFlag[1].payload.url;
                if (location.href.includes(url)) {
                    console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Already on the redirect URL, skipping');
                } else {
                    console.log('[EXPERIMENT] Redirecting to:', url);
                    handleRedirectUrl(url);
                }
            } else {
                console.log('[EXPERIMENT] No treatment flag detected');
            }
        } catch (error) {
            console.error('[EXPERIMENT] Error fetching flag keys:', error);
        }
    }

    // Run experiments
    window.addEventListener("load", () => {
        handleExperiments().catch(error => {
            console.error('[EXPERIMENT] Error handling experiments:', error);
        });
    });
</script>
<!-- END Experiments (FEATURE) -->

<script async>
// Original Pen by Matt Smith
const second = 1000,
    minute = second * 60,
    hour = minute * 60,
    day = hour * 24;

function getNextSunday(date) {
    const dayOfWeek = date.getDay();
    const daysToNextSunday = (7 - dayOfWeek) % 7 || 7;

    const nextSunday = new Date(date);
    nextSunday.setDate(date.getDate() + daysToNextSunday);
    nextSunday.setHours(23, 59, 59, 999)

    return nextSunday;
}

let countDown = getNextSunday(new Date()).getTime(),
    x = setInterval(function() {

        let now = new Date().getTime(),
            distance = countDown - now;

        if (distance < 0) {
            countDown = getNextSunday(new Date()).getTime()
        }

        // Validation checks
        let daysElem = document.getElementById('days');
        let hoursElem = document.getElementById('hours');
        let minutesElem = document.getElementById('minutes');
        let secondsElem = document.getElementById('seconds');

        if (!daysElem || !hoursElem || !minutesElem || !secondsElem) {
            return;  // Exit if one of the elements doesn't exist
        }

        daysElem.innerText = Math.floor(distance / (day));
        hoursElem.innerText = Math.floor((distance % (day)) / (hour));
        minutesElem.innerText = Math.floor((distance % (hour)) / (minute));
        secondsElem.innerText = Math.floor((distance % (minute)) / second);

    }, second);

</script>




<script src="https://unpkg.com/gsap@3.12.2/dist/gsap.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://unpkg.com/gsap@3.12.2/dist/ScrollTrigger.min.js"></script>

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger);

    const banner = document.querySelector(".flavia_banner-component");
    const closeBtn = document.querySelector(".flavia_banner-close");

    // Função para definir um cookie com duração em horas
    function setCookie(name, value, hours) {
      const d = new Date();
      d.setTime(d.getTime() + (hours * 60 * 60 * 1000));
      document.cookie = `${name}=${value};expires=${d.toUTCString()};path=/`;
    }

    // Função para obter um cookie
    function getCookie(name) {
      const value = `; ${document.cookie}`;
      const parts = value.split(`; ${name}=`);
      if (parts.length === 2) return parts.pop().split(';').shift();
    }

    // Verifica se o cookie existe
    const hideBanner = getCookie("hide_flavia_banner");

    // Se NÃO houver cookie, ativa a animação
    if (!hideBanner) {
      // Garante estado inicial
      gsap.set(banner, {
        opacity: 0,
        y: 100
      });

      ScrollTrigger.create({
        trigger: document.body,
        start: "top top",
        end: "bottom bottom",
        onUpdate: (self) => {
          if (self.progress >= 0.3) {
            gsap.to(banner, {
              opacity: 1,
              y: 0,
              duration: 1,
              ease: "power3.out"
            });
            self.kill();
          }
        }
      });
    } else {
      // Se cookie existir, esconde o banner permanentemente
      gsap.set(banner, { display: "none" });
    }

    // Clicar no botão de fechar salva o cookie
    if (closeBtn) {
      closeBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
        setCookie("hide_flavia_banner", "true", 24); // 24h
        gsap.to(banner, {
          opacity: 0,
          y: 100,
          duration: 0.6,
          onComplete: () => {
            banner.style.display = "none";
          }
        });
      });
    }
  });
</script>



<!-- START UTM PARAMETERS -->
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async () => {
      const allowedDomains = [
        'infinitepay.io',
        'webflow.io', // Include this if your branches use this domain
        // Add other domains as needed
      ];
    
      const EXCLUDED_PATTERNS = [
        '/blog',
        'ajuda.infinitepay.io',
        'web.infinitepay.io',
        '/todos-os-posts',
        '/categoria',
        'app.infinitepay.io',
        '/indicar',
        '/legal',
        '/newsroom',
        '/sobre-nos',
        '/about-us'
      ];
    
      const shouldSkipLink = (url) => 
        EXCLUDED_PATTERNS.some(pattern => url.href.includes(pattern));
    
      const isAllowedDomain = (url) => 
        allowedDomains.some(domain => url.hostname.endsWith(domain));
    
      const addUTMParameters = async (link, medium, content) => {
        let href = link.href;
        if (href.startsWith('/')) {
          href = `${window.location.protocol}//${window.location.hostname}${href}`;
        }
        const url = new URL(href);
        if (isAllowedDomain(url) && !shouldSkipLink(url)) {
          url.searchParams.set('utm_source', 'blog');
          url.searchParams.set('utm_medium', medium);
          url.searchParams.set('utm_campaign', 'BLOG-HOME');
          url.searchParams.set('utm_content', content);
          link.href = url.toString();
        }
      };
    
      const applyUTMParameters = async () => {
        // Handle cases where data-utm is directly on the <a> element
        const links = document.querySelectorAll('a[data-utm]');
        for (const link of links) {
          const medium = link.getAttribute('data-utm');
          const content = link.getAttribute('data-content');
          await addUTMParameters(link, medium, content);
        }
    
        // Handle cases where data-utm is on a parent element, and links are nested within
        const containers = document.querySelectorAll('[data-utm]:not(a)');
        for (const container of containers) {
          const medium = container.getAttribute('data-utm');
          const links = container.querySelectorAll('a');
    
          for (const link of links) {
            // Use the closest data-content from either the link itself or a parent
            let content = link.getAttribute('data-content');
            if (!content) {
              const closestContentDiv = link.closest('[data-content]');
              content = closestContentDiv ? closestContentDiv.getAttribute('data-content') : '';
            }
            await addUTMParameters(link, medium, content);
          }
        }
      };
    
      await applyUTMParameters();
    });
    </script>
    <!-- END UTM PARAMETERS -->
    
    
    
<!-- BLOG - Adiciona UTM ao botão do banner -->
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  const pathname = window.location.pathname;

  if (!pathname.startsWith('/blog')) return;

  const banner = document.querySelector('.flavia_banner-component');
  if (!banner) return;

  const button = banner.querySelector('.button');
  if (!button) return;

  const utmSource = 'blog';
  const utmMedium = 'NAV_BANNER';

  // Gera a slug final
  let slug = pathname.split('/').filter(Boolean).pop();
  if (!slug || slug === 'blog') {
    slug = 'blog';
  }

  const utmCampaign = slug;

  const originalHref = button.getAttribute('href') || '';
  const url = new URL(originalHref, window.location.origin);

  url.searchParams.set('utm_source', utmSource);
  url.searchParams.set('utm_medium', utmMedium);
  url.searchParams.set('utm_campaign', utmCampaign);

  button.setAttribute('href', url.toString());
});
</script>
